exp-2.title: Full Stack Developer
points: Developing and maintaining web applications using Java and Angular as main technologies.
Working with microsservices archtecture in back-end(Java Spring Boot) and front-end(SPA), using Azure Service Bus to management data between microsservices.
Using PostgreeSQL to management data of applications.

Through an online platform and application, DriveB connects managers, drivers and workshops and optimizes their administrative and operational processes.
